SELECT o.*, cfplanner_count, ifnull(history_sales/10000,0) history_sales, ifnull(this_month_sales/10000,0) this_month_sales, ifnull(this_month_fee,0) this_month_fee, ifnull(lastMonthSales,0)/10000 lastMonthSales, ifnull(lastMonthYearSales,0)/10000 lastMonthYearSales, ifnull(lastMonthStockYearSales,0)/10000 lastMonthStockYearSales, ifnull(lastMonthStockYearSales,0)*12/10000 lastMonthStockSales FROM tcrm_sales_org o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sales_org_id ,count(1) cfplanner_count from tcrm_cfplanner where sales_org_id is not null GROUP BY sales_org_id ) t1 on o.sales_org_id = t1.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sales_org_id, ifnull(sum(f.product_amount),0) history_sales from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=f.profit_cfplanner_id where f.fee_type='1001' and c.sales_org_id is not null GROUP BY c.sales_org_id ) t2 on o.sales_org_id = t2.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sales_org_id, ifnull(sum(f.product_amount),0) this_month_sales from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=f.profit_cfplanner_id where f.fee_type='1001' and c.sales_org_id is not null and date_format(f.create_time, '%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY c.sales_org_id ) t3 on o.sales_org_id = t3.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sales_org_id, ifnull(sum(f.fee_amount),0) this_month_fee from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=f.profit_cfplanner_id where f.fee_type='1001' and c.sales_org_id is not null and date_format(f.create_time, '%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY c.sales_org_id ) t4 on o.sales_org_id = t4.sales_org_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sales_org_id, ifnull(sum(f.product_amount),0) lastMonthSales from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=f.profit_cfplanner_id where f.fee_type='1001' and c.sales_org_id is not null and date_format(f.create_time, '%Y-%m')= date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY c.sales_org_id ) t5 on o.sales_org_id = t5.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.sales_org_id, ifnull(sum(f.yearpur_amount),0) lastMonthYearSales from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=f.profit_cfplanner_id where f.fee_type='1001' and c.sales_org_id is not null and date_format(f.create_time, '%Y-%m')= date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY c.sales_org_id ) t6 on o.sales_org_id = t6.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.sales_org_id, ifnull(SUM(t.stockYearpurAmt), 0) lastMonthStockYearSales FROM tcrm_sales_org s LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c ON s.sales_org_id = c.sales_org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT fd.profit_cfplanner_id, SUM( CASE WHEN date_format(fd.create_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) THEN fd.yearpur_amount ELSE 0 END ) stockYearpurAmt FROM tcim_feedetail fd JOIN ( SELECT fd.bill_id, MIN(fd.create_time) mintime FROM tcim_feedetail fd LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON p.product_id = fd.product_id WHERE p.is_fixed_deadline = 2 AND fd.fee_amount > 0 AND fd.fee_type = '1001' GROUP BY fd.bill_id ) a ON fd.bill_id = a.bill_id AND fd.create_time <> a.mintime GROUP BY fd.bill_id ) t ON c.user_id = t.profit_cfplanner_id GROUP BY s.sales_org_id )t7 on o.sales_org_id = t7.sales_org_id
1=1
and o.name = #{query.nameOrmobile} or o.contacts =#{query.nameOrmobile} or o.contact_mobile =#{query.nameOrmobile}
order BY o.id desc
